name: Sauron
title: Ruler of Mordor and Supreme Wraith of Darkness
bio: Sauron's original name was Mairon. He was the mightiest Maia of the Vala Aulë the Smith, and learned much from Aulë of smithing and handiwork, becoming a great craftsman and mighty in the lore of Aulë's people.[2] He was among the most powerful Maiar.
